decision_conditions: Sufficient and adequate evidence has been submitted to establish, on the balance of probability, that the planning permission 211642FUL dated 09.06.2021 has been implemented within the limit of condition 1. The described proposal is lawful by virtue of Section 56(4) (2) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
description: Confirmation of implementation of planning permission 211642FUL dated 09.06.2021 for 'Change of use from commercial (Use Class E) and conversion to provide 8no. residential units (Use Class C3) including lowering of the existing basement; creation of roof dormers to the front and rear of the fire station building, rooflights on the stable block and minor repair and replacement works; with associated private amenity spaces, and provision of refuse storage'  (Lawful Development Certificate for an Existing Development)
